description:
Modals are useful when a user needs to leave the normal application flow to focus
on a specific message or workflow. Avoid using modals frequently or stacking modals.
name: Modal - Styles
usage:
Modal styles can be added using the template in the code section above with the classes given above. It is recommended to add a method to the `modal__backdrop` to allow the user to close the modal by clicking. Animations: The modal activates on click by using the fade-in effect on the background, and the slide-down-in on the modal container to enter into view. Duration: The background enters at 100ms. The modal enters at 300ms. ```html

Modal Title

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Curabitur tristique convallis lacus at maximus.

```
